verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H1961"\w* end, \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

Hear, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w my|strong="H5315"\w* prayer, \w when|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* make supplication \w to|strong="H0430"\w* thee: deliver \w my|strong="H5315"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* fear \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* enemy.

Thou hast protected \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w from|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* assembly \w of|strong="H6944"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* malignant; \w from|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H6944"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* workers \w of|strong="H6944"\w* iniquity.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* whetted \w their|strong="H3588"\w* tongues like \w a|strong="H3588"\w* sword; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* bent \w their|strong="H3588"\w* bow \w a|strong="H3588"\w* bitter \w thing|strong="H3588"\w*,
\w To|strong="H8034"\w* shoot \w in|strong="H8034"\w* secret \w the|strong="H1288"\w* undefiled.

\w They|strong="H6310"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* shoot at \w him|strong="H3644"\w* \w on|strong="H6310"\w* \w a|strong="H3644"\w* sudden, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* \w not|strong="H5315"\w* fear: \w they|strong="H6310"\w* \w are|strong="H8193"\w* resolute \w in|strong="H5315"\w* wickedness. \w They|strong="H6310"\w* \w have|strong="H7646"\w* talked \w of|strong="H6310"\w* hiding snares; \w they|strong="H6310"\w* \w have|strong="H7646"\w* \w said|strong="H6310"\w*: \w Who|strong="H5315"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* see them?

\w They|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* searched \w after|strong="H5921"\w* iniquities: \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w have|strong="H0518"\w* failed \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* search. Man shall \w come|strong="H2142"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* deep heart:
\w And|strong="H3671"\w* God shall \w be|strong="H1961"\w* exalted. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* arrows \w of|strong="H3671"\w* children \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* wounds:

\w And|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H0310"\w* tongues against \w them|strong="H0310"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* made weak. \w All|strong="H0310"\w* \w that|strong="H5315"\w* saw \w them|strong="H0310"\w* \w were|strong="H5315"\w* troubled;

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* every \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* afraid. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* declared \w the|strong="H0935"\w* works \w of|strong="H0776"\w* God: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* understood \w his|strong="H0935"\w* doings.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* just \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* hope \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* all \w the|strong="H5921"\w* upright \w in|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w shall|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* praised.
